title: I cannot drag my Quick Settings all the way from the top to the bottom of the screen.
content: I cannot drag my Quick Settings all the way from the top to the bottom of the screen diagonallyalike described here : https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/6010316?hl=en-GB. (topic - "Test the affected part of your screen"). None of the tips help. While dragging Quick Settings releases in the middle of the screen. There is a 1 cm wide stripe of the screen where it is completly unresponsive.
